benchmark_details.name: GraphSilo
benchmark_details.overview: GraphSilo is the largest dataset for graph reasoning problems with fine-grained step-wise labels, built using automated Task-oriented Trajectories and Monte Carlo Tree Search to generate detailed reasoning steps with step-wise labels.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance the reasoning capabilities of large language models using process reward models for graph computational problems.

data.source: GraphSilo dataset built using automated methods for generating graph reasoning tasks.
data.annotation: Automated labeling with Task-oriented Trajectories and Monte Carlo Tree Search.

methodology.calculation: Incremental scoring based on step-wise labels during reinforcement learning and inference.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores correspond to more correct reasoning in each step.
methodology.validation: Evaluation against multiple known graph reasoning tasks.
